system.description: It conjures a very tiny Devilkin the size of a thumb. This pitchfork-wielding little fellow runs like a mouse, and can fit through the tiniest cracks. He can spy on conversations, steal small objects, or try to unlock a door or chest from the inside. He is level 1, AC 14, causes 1 Hp damage, and has all of 1 Hp, so he can be swatted like a fat horsefly.
